#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType HoleQualification.

== Name ==

*[CHoleQualification HoleQualification]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--HoleQualification (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Qualify a golf course played from a set of tees.
			
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...>  (qualification-usga | qualification-other) </...>
}}}
----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CRoomForExtension golfml:RoomForExtension] || [CRoomForExtension qualification-other] ||  						Qualify a golf course played from a set of tees according to a non-USGA golfing authority.					 ||
|| [CHoleQualificationUSGA golfml:HoleQualificationUSGA] || [CHoleQualificationUSGA qualification-usga] ||  						Qualify a golf course played from a set of tees according to the USGA rules.					 ||

    	[CTees Tees]
